Articles.Content:
Thought Id start my tinkering with KSP2 by recreating one of my previous, early career level light aircraft.

Initial thoughts are that Im liking things overall, but find the UI to be a bit clunky across the board.

Liking the procedural wing stuff, but would like to see a bit more shape configurability. 

Really missing the rotate / move tools ability to single click to snap a movement / align with world, love the blueprint mode.

Other than being a bit chuggy and buggy (as expected), loving it

 

Plane flew pretty much as expected as well!
